title: Gristle
creator_credit: Ernest Films, Carolyn-Johnson Films, New South Wales Film and Television Office, Carolyn Johnson and Andrew Murray
brief_description: Two animal transport workers from the company Flying Animals (Rhys Muldoon and Darren Gilshenan) find themselves in possession of a dead cat called Gristle - a certain blot on Doug’s perfect record which could impede future promotions.
creator_credit_for_label: Ernest Films, Carolyn-Johnson Films, New South Wales Film and Television Office, Carolyn Johnson and Andrew Murray
